# About

::: {style="text-align: justify"}
Shantanu Ozarkar currently works at the Department of Anthropology, Savirtibai Phule Pune University. Shantanu does research in Biological Anthropology. Their current project is 'Genetics of skin pigmentation in South Asia.'
